originalText.text: Beautiful campus, nice views of the city from the island . Air tram to the campus was fun and worth every penny. Buildings are amazing!

text.text: Beautiful campus, nice views of the city from the island . Air tram to the campus was fun and worth every penny. Buildings are amazing!

originalText.text: Cornell Tech campus tour on Roosevelt Island is just a lobby visit of the Bloomberg and Tata Innovation center buildings. You cannot visit classrooms. You get to see the lobby cafe. Save yourself a trip, view the pictures attached. Take the ferry from Manhattan if you have to visit in person.  Informational session in the Fall, is when you can visit the classrooms, not on Wednesday campus tours. Tata Innovations center building is gorgeous.

originalText.text: Best uni in ny. But cannot go into building. Cafe on first floor is OK to visit and sell lunch

text.text: Best uni in ny. But cannot go into building. Cafe on first floor is OK to visit and sell lunch

originalText.text: Outside, it is a series of new modern architectures still expanding. Inside, it is the fast growing tech hub for teaching, growing and incubating high tech start-ups, with Ivy-league STEM and Bz training. Open studios for VCs and entrepreneurs being held regularly, it is the growing tech start-up center of the East Coast and innovative educational facility for the future. A great variety of courses, from building a tech start-up to developing tech products, learning forefront technologies like Human-computer interaction, AI, Blockchain, IOT, AR/VR, and Computer Vision. Start-up funding and Bz& legal mangement courses are also taught by top-notch Cornell professors.

originalText.text: Cornell Tech is a game changer in graduate education. The campus, located at 2 W Loop Rd in New York City, offers a unique blend of technology, business, and creativity. The faculty, business leaders, entrepreneurs, and students all share a common goal of pushing boundaries and finding solutions to real-world problems. The environment is highly collaborative and inspiring, leading to innovative and impactful ideas. I highly recommend checking out Cornell Tech for anyone interested in cutting-edge technology and entrepreneurship.
